name: CTRL/CMD+K - Unread Channels and input field focus

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
CTRL/CMD+K - Unread Channels and input field focus
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Ensure you have some unread channels 
  2. Press CTRL+K (Windows) or CMD+K (Mac)
inline.expectedResult:
• Switch Channels modal opens
  • Focus is placed in input field 
  • Unread channels are listed

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• Command + K input field loses focus when window loses focus, causing search results to disappear — MM-25841
  • Quick Switcher is showing an empty box inspite of me having unreads. — MM-26008
